bill.summary:
Energy Assistance for American Families Act - Amends the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to authorize appropriations for FY2013-FY2016.
Permits a state to use any allotment from such appropriations to assist households whose income does not exceed 75% of the state median income.
